@JCArcher yes, I remember reading something like that in hentai 2 read; iirc it only had 5 chapters back then. Now that it's getting translated again, I hope it gets a happy ending. Or else, I'm going to flip tables so hard.

If this is the webtoon I remember, then it's *not* netorare. That isn't her boyfriend who's watching the video, but her brother. And she isn't 'stolen', shortly after these events happen, and when they keep tormenting her, she commits suicide out of shame and despair. That's actually the prologue, really - the story starts with a brother and sister pair, who only have each other with their parents not being there. Their love is platonic, but deep, with the elder brother having served as her guardian and protector.  The girl gets kidnapped, gang-raped, and then blackmailed further. The brother is unaware, up until she commits suicide and then looking for the reason, finds the vid (or he gets mailed it, not sure which). That emotional breakdown is from his sister committing suicide and him finding out he couldn't protect her and was unaware of her suffering, since she hid it from him. This is just the prologue, though I never really got into the webtoon - too depressing for me.
